程序包 com.antlersoft.android.bc

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    IBCActivityManager  
    IBCGestureDetector
    Create a gesture detector in a version friendly way, avoiding incompatible API on older version and deprecated API on newer version
    IBCHaptic
    Access the Haptic interfaces added in version 3 without breaking compatibility
    IBCMotionEvent
    Access to SDK-dependent features of MotionEvent
    IBCScaleGestureDetector
    Backwards-compatibility interface to the android.view.ScaleGestureDetector introduced in Android SDK 8.
    IBCStorageContext
    Provides a way to access the directory on external storage as returned by Context.getExternal... added in API 8 that will work with earlier API releases.
    OnScaleGestureListener
    The listener for receiving notifications when gestures occur.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BCActivityManagerV5  
    BCFactory
    Create interface implementations appropriate to the current version of the SDK; implementations can allow use of higher-level SDK calls in .apk's that will still run on lower-level SDK's
    BCGestureDetectorDefault  
    BCStorageContext7  
    SimpleOnScaleGestureListener
    A convenience class to extend when you only want to listen for a subset of scaling-related events.
